a86aee78-1118-42d4-9bfe-9dc765a8c015.name: Solar Power Subsystem
a86aee78-1118-42d4-9bfe-9dc765a8c015.description: Captures solar energy and stores it for system operation with a focus on cost-effectiveness.

embodiment.principle: Standard Photovoltaic Panels with Basic Battery Storage
embodiment.description: Uses cost-effective, rigid solar panels and lead-acid batteries for reliability.

physics_models.name: Energy_Budget
physics_models.coding_directives: def energy_budget(solar_irradiance, time):\n    return solar_irradiance * 0.15 * time
physics_models.python_code: def energy_budget(solar_irradiance, time):\n    return solar_irradiance * 0.15 * time
physics_models.coder_notes: Solar irradiance is constant at 300 W/m².
assumptions: Solar irradiance is constant at 300 W/m².

a86aee78-1118-42d4-9bfe-9dc765a8c015.verification_plan: The energy budget will be verified through testing under controlled solar irradiance conditions.

63fb7911-771a-4fa9-9ad6-73809700b117.name: Filtration Subsystem
63fb7911-771a-4fa9-9ad6-73809700b117.description: Removes contaminants from raw water to produce potable water with minimal cost.

embodiment.description: Utilizes a ceramic filter element for basic filtration.

physics_models.name: Flow_Rate
physics_models.coding_directives: def flow_rate(filter_area, permeability, viscosity):\n    return (filter_area * permeability) / viscosity
physics_models.python_code: def flow_rate(filter_area, permeability, viscosity):\n    return (filter_area * permeability) / viscosity

63fb7911-771a-4fa9-9ad6-73809700b117.verification_plan: The filtration rate and contaminant removal efficiency will be tested with standardized water samples.

306f8c22-b2f5-4f68-8032-cb1a09d4d195.name: Water Quality Monitoring Subsystem
306f8c22-b2f5-4f68-8032-cb1a09d4d195.description: Monitors and displays water quality parameters with a focus on cost-effectiveness.

embodiment.description: Incorporates basic sensors for pH, turbidity, and TDS.

physics_models.name: Sensor_Response
physics_models.coding_directives: def sensor_response(sensor_delay, processing_time):\n    return sensor_delay + processing_time
physics_models.python_code: def sensor_response(sensor_delay, processing_time):\n    return sensor_delay + processing_time
physics_models.coder_notes: Constant sensor delay and processing time.
assumptions: Constant sensor delay and processing time.

306f8c22-b2f5-4f68-8032-cb1a09d4d195.verification_plan: The sensor response time and accuracy will be verified through controlled laboratory tests.

0442fed9-e3f2-4da5-b381-6b6c59c0b990.name: Power Management Subsystem
0442fed9-e3f2-4da5-b381-6b6c59c0b990.description: Manages and optimizes power distribution and storage with a focus on cost-effectiveness.

embodiment.principle: Basic Charge Controller with Battery Management
embodiment.description: Uses a basic charge controller and battery management system.

physics_models.name: Charge_Discharge
physics_models.equations: Battery Level = Initial Charge - (Discharge Rate * Time)
physics_models.coding_directives: def battery_level(initial_charge, discharge_rate, time):\n    return initial_charge - (discharge_rate * time)
physics_models.python_code: def battery_level(initial_charge, discharge_rate, time):\n    return initial_charge - (discharge_rate * time)

0442fed9-e3f2-4da5-b381-6b6c59c0b990.verification_plan: The battery level and discharge rate will be tested under various load conditions.
